options.content: You must modify the `include_constituents` flag to `true` in all volume.yaml templates. Please see [FlexGroup dashboard](https://github.com/NetApp/harvest/wiki/FAQ#flexgroup-dashboard) for more details. Enabling FlexGroup constituents counters may slow down data collection due to a high number of constituents metrics.

panels.description: Average latency in microseconds for the WAFL filesystem to process all the operations on the volume; not including request processing or network communication time.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Constituents by Average Latency

panels.description: Volume total throughput.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Constituents by Average Throughput

panels.description: Number of operations per second serviced by the volume.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Constituents by Total IOPs

panels.description: FlexGroup constituents details.

targets.expr: volume_labels{aggr=~"$Aggregate",cluster=~"$Cluster",datacenter=~"$Datacenter",style="flexgroup_constituent",volume=~"$Constituent"}
volume_new_status{aggr=~"$Aggregate",cluster=~"$Cluster",datacenter=~"$Datacenter",style="flexgroup_constituent",volume=~"$Constituent"}
volume_size_total{aggr=~"$Aggregate",cluster=~"$Cluster",datacenter=~"$Datacenter",style="flexgroup_constituent",volume=~"$Constituent"}
volume_size_used_percent{aggr=~"$Aggregate",cluster=~"$Cluster",datacenter=~"$Datacenter",style="flexgroup_constituent",volume=~"$Constituent"}
volume_sis_dedup_saved{aggr=~"$Aggregate",cluster=~"$Cluster",datacenter=~"$Datacenter",style="flexgroup_constituent",volume=~"$Constituent"}
volume_sis_compress_saved{aggr=~"$Aggregate",cluster=~"$Cluster",datacenter=~"$Datacenter",style="flexgroup_constituent",volume=~"$Constituent"}
volume_space_logical_used{aggr=~"$Aggregate",cluster=~"$Cluster",datacenter=~"$Datacenter",style="flexgroup_constituent",volume=~"$Constituent"}
volume_space_physical_used{aggr=~"$Aggregate",cluster=~"$Cluster",datacenter=~"$Datacenter",style="flexgroup_constituent",volume=~"$Constituent"}

panels.title: FlexGroup Constituents in Cluster

panels.description: Average latency in microseconds for the WAFL filesystem to process read request to the volume; not including request processing or network communication time.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by Read Latency

panels.description: Bytes read per second.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by Read Throughput

panels.description: Number of read operations per second from the volume.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by Read IOPS

panels.description: Average latency in microseconds for the WAFL filesystem to process write request to the volume; not including request processing or network communication time.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by Write Latency

panels.description: Bytes written per second.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by Write Throughput

panels.description: Number of write operations per second to the volume.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by Write IOPS

panels.description: Footprint of blocks written to the volume in bytes for the performance tier (bin 0).
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by Performance Tier Footprint

panels.description: Footprint of blocks written to the volume in performance tier (bin 0) as a percentage of aggregate size.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by Performance Tier Footprint %

panels.description: Footprint of blocks written to the volume in bytes for capacity tier (bin 1).
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by Capacity Tier Footprint

panels.description: Footprint of blocks written to the volume in capacity tier (bin 1) as a percentage of aggregate size.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by Capacity Tier Footprint %

panels.description: Average latency in microseconds for the WAFL filesystem to process read request to the volume; not including request processing or network communication time.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by Read Latency

panels.description: Average latency in microseconds for the WAFL filesystem to process write request to the volume; not including request processing or network communication time.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by Write Latency

panels.description: Average latency in microseconds for the WAFL filesystem to process other operations to the volume; not including request processing or network communication time.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by Other Latency

panels.description: Number of read operations per second from the volume.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by Read IOPs

panels.description: Number of write operations per second to the volume.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by Write IOPs

panels.description: Number of other operations per second to the volume.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by Other IOPs

panels.description: Bytes read per second.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by Read Throughput

panels.description: Bytes written per second.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by Write Throughput
